title: Result a Lab Test
description: A lab analyzer has finished processing a batch of samples. A technician needs to review and release the results into the LIS.

tasks.description: Review the results from the analyzer interface, which have been transmitted to the LIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician views the batch of results pending verification.

tasks.description: Check the quality control results for the batch to ensure they are within acceptable limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician confirms the QC was successful, validating the patient results.

tasks.description: Verify and release the patient results. Any critical values are automatically flagged.
tasks.expected_outcome: The results are finalized in the LIS and transmitted to the main EHR for the provider to review.
